meanings.definition: To pledge or bind oneself to a certain course of action
meanings.sent1: I commit to finishing my homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: She always commits to helping her friends in need.
meanings.sent3: He decided to commit to waking up early every day, even on weekends.
meanings.sent4: The team captain asked everyone to commit to attending all practices.
meanings.sent5: By signing the contract, she made a commitment to work at the company for at least a year.

meanings.definition: To carry out or perform a task
meanings.sent1: Please commit to completing the project by Friday.
meanings.sent2: He commits to exercising every morning to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The robot was programmed to commit to cleaning the entire house.
meanings.sent4: She had to commit to studying hard for her upcoming exams.
meanings.sent5: The chef will commit to preparing a delicious meal for the guests.

meanings.definition: To engage in a romantic relationship
meanings.sent1: They decided to commit to being in a relationship together.
meanings.sent2: She was ready to commit to her partner for a lifetime.
meanings.sent3: The couple made a pact to commit to each other no matter what.
meanings.sent4: He wanted to commit to building a future with his girlfriend.
meanings.sent5: Their decision to commit to each other brought them closer than ever.

meanings.definition: To entrust someone or something to another's care
meanings.sent1: I commit my pet fish to your care while I'm away.
meanings.sent2: She had to commit her important documents to the safekeeping of the bank.
meanings.sent3: He decided to commit his favorite book to his best friend for safekeeping.
meanings.sent4: The parents commit their children to the care of the babysitter for the evening.
meanings.sent5: The museum will commit the valuable artifact to the expert for restoration.

meanings.sent1: The suspect was caught red-handed trying to commit a robbery.
meanings.sent2: He was arrested for attempting to commit a fraud scheme.
meanings.sent3: The movie character planned to commit a heist in the final scene.
meanings.sent4: She was shocked to discover her neighbor was trying to commit a burglary.
meanings.sent5: The criminal mastermind was known for his ability to commit elaborate crimes without getting caught.
